name: Spooky Slice
description:
This is my submission for Global Game Jam 2022, which you can see here: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/ghost-game-8

Slice ghosts, slice-hop on the ground and walls, and stop too many ghosts spawning! 

  • This game requires keyboard and mouse control. Use the WASD keys to move around the map and use left click to swing your sword. 
  • There is no jump button - just aim your sword downwards and swing for some hefty knockback! 
  • You get more knockback from hitting ghosts. 
  • You can climb walls (including the invisible confines of the world) by aiming at the wall and looking slightly downards at a 45 degree angle, then slicing repeatedly. 

Easy mode is a relaxed version of the game with a bigger sword hitbox, a far higher cap on the number of ghosts before you get spooked (lose), and a lower ghost spawn rate.

GGJ2022 Diversifiers Used

  • Stress Free - Add a mode which makes the game considerably easier

Assets Used

  • Autumn House Model - Zhenya on Sketchfab
  • Fantasy Ghost Model - warbossdil on Sketchfab
